    • move

      public void move()
      Snake movement by deleting 1 cell from a tail and adding 1 cell in front of head. If actual snake length is less that it should be, then deleting 1 cell from a tail doesn't happen. If actual snake length is more that it should be, then adding 1 cell in front of head doesn't happen.

    • isPossibleTurn

      public boolean isPossibleTurn​(Direction direction)
      Check if snake can do a turn in the direction (snake can't turn 180°).
      Parameters:
      direction - Direction to turn
      Returns:
      true if snake can do a turn in the direction
